headline: How Analysts Are Reframing The Story For Citizens Financial Group (CFG)
summary: Citizens Financial Group is back in focus after analysts reset their price target, putting fresh attention on how the market is framing the stock today. The shift in target reflects evolving expectations and new information that is reshaping the story investors attach to Citizens Financial Group. Stay with this article to see how you can keep up with these narrative changes as they happen. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story.
